K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-0: @137a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-1: sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-2: aom na ma stree bha ga ba ti d'a n'a dhi pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-3: tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-4: na ma sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-5: ma h'a k'a n'a da ma k'a n'am/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-6: na mo bha ga ba tyee /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-7: sh'i la pa ri purna shi re ye sh'i lam me /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-8: s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-9: kin tishtha sam buddho bha ga ban dharma sya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-10: sa m'a dzny'a na pa ya ti sv'ah'a; bzod pa'i
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-11: snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-12: par 'gyur ro // na ma:sarba ta th'a ga t'a ya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-14: na ma kshant'i ye ba hu bhi:/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-15: ta th'a ga ta na bhu ta ko ti bhi
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-16: ba ri barti ta ye raksham ku ru tu ku
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-17: ru tu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-18: sh'akya mu ni sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am aa
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-19: pa ri mi t'a dzny'a na go tsa ro dzny'a
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-21: brtson 'grus kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-22: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-23: ma tsin tya bi sh'a ya n'am/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-24: na mo stu te bha ga ba te b'irya p'a ra mi t'a /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-25: b'irya na ku ru b'irye b'irye /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-26: mah'a b'irya ta th'a ga ta /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-27: sarba dzny'a n'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-28: bsam gtan gyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137a-29: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga t'a nam/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-1: dhya na pri ye h'um phat/
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-2: shes rab kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-3: na ma: ta th'a ga ta ya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-4: aa pa ra mi t'a dzny'a na go tsa r'a ya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-5: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-6: dzny'a na p'a ra mi t'a ye /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-7: dzny'a n'am me ku ru ku ru bi g'an ta th'a ga ta sya /
K12D0580=D0936_H0751:137b-8: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
